entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 10:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -20.0°C
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -23.2°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
